messages: 28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:28): hey MickMcMack!
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:34): Heya wavez.
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:34): I hate this heat, I couldn't get to sleep properly last night.
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:34): MickMcMack, neither could I
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:35): MickMcMack, have you seen the array modifier video?
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:35): http://download.blender.org/demo/movies/arraydemo.mp4
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:36): wavez, why is my internet so slow? :S
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:37): I'm on a 2Mbps connectiong and it goes at ~20KB/sec. :s
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:37): MickMcMack, because your ISP sucks?
5bdc77931e848e24794854bb75d842b7 (13:37): MickMcMack, it's not just you.
5bdc77931e848e24794854bb75d842b7 (13:37): Which implies to me the server sucks.
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:38): Any and all downloads go at around that speed.
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:50): Ok, wavez, that's pretty cool.
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:50): It also seemed to do a lot of the stuff I previously did with curves.
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:50): Just as I'm about to write a tut on curves.
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:50): MickMcMack, it can't do what curves do
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:51): MickMcMack, it bends by using propagating rotations
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:51): similiar to one of the rigs I show
4ea5d2c026ca7904f501a671cf06315a (13:51): uh, anyone know a free gif editor?
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:51): I have another rig though, that is constrained to a curve
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:51): curves will do what the user wants. Propagating rotations can only do spirals and arches
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:52): Teal_Thanatos, GIMP ?
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:52): wavez, yeah, I still have _some_ use for curves.
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:52): But it's not going to be a particularly long tutorial on it. \o/
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:52): MickMcMack, we still have _lots_ of uses for curves
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (13:52): BevOb and TapOb == my friends!
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (13:52): ya, those are very cool
4ea5d2c026ca7904f501a671cf06315a (13:54): thanks MickMcMack, I'll give that a try
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (14:02): So wavez, do we know if we're getting this extended deadline or not?
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (14:02): MickMcMack, no clue man. I'm sure if you go over, Tim will say "eh, just finish it up kinda soon"
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (14:03): send an email to the list though
28d5ade3858119655f5dda950d98b297 (14:03): they said they needed responses, we gave 'em that. Now we need a response!
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (14:03): I think timmeh's a bit annoyed with me for leaving it 'til the last minute. ¨_¨
4ea5d2c026ca7904f501a671cf06315a (14:05): gimp is bloody complex
4ea5d2c026ca7904f501a671cf06315a (14:05): isn't there something as simple as opening up the gif and being able to edit each frame quickly and easily?? >_<
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (14:06): Teal_Thanatos, not sure.
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (14:06): Teal_Thanatos, Windows or *NIX?
4ea5d2c026ca7904f501a671cf06315a (14:06): the old Microsoft Gif Animator was pretty good, but you had to copy and paste the image out to edit it, and it was hard to get back into place >.>
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (14:10): Teal_Thanatos, TheGimp
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (14:11): Teal_Thanatos, there are quite a few GIF editors for Windows.
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (14:11): Gimp is complex ^^ ?
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (14:11): wow what is the world for Blender then lol ?
4ea5d2c026ca7904f501a671cf06315a (14:12): blenders a pain in the ass :P
4ea5d2c026ca7904f501a671cf06315a (14:14): you can't deny it
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (14:15): hmmm, it is relative
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (14:15): i can say, it is easy..... when you know it ;)
3f4387e15113f958fd3b902686d2dc00 (14:18): i've used it for 2 days and while i don't know everything yet, i think it rules
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (14:22): LOD, that is awesome! :D
4ea5d2c026ca7904f501a671cf06315a (14:23): thats pretty neat LOD
96edc0f3dffdd1c1211fef287d076597 (14:34): nice knot LOD is there a secret to tying knots in blender?
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (14:35): it is a mesh tube with CurveDeform on a Path
96edc0f3dffdd1c1211fef287d076597 (14:35): thx, everything is a secret if you dont know
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (14:37): I honestly can't remember how I made some of the decorations on my buildings. :)
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (14:45): http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/2794/friezerb3.jpg
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (14:50): Bugger, I'm gonna have to reboot to get those other buildings.
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (14:55): A word of warning.
a4009c2895d857e79caebfd744c8a062 (14:55): Never "Recalc Normals" on a 250k vert mesh.
f475fc972b766c85d9c2dd5f4d320994 (15:01): how's the documentation going BSoD-ers?
